mapper.select: SELECT am.animalID, am.nickname, bct.commonName, am.classificationCode, am.status FROM animalManagement am NATURAL JOIN biologicalClassificationTable bct

SELECT speciesID, taxonomy, scientificName, commonName FROM biologicalClassificationTable WHERE taxonomy LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR scientificName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR commonName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT tankID FROM tankManagement WHERE branchID = #{param1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO animalManagement (speciesID, tankID, branchID, classificationCode, CodeNumber, nickname, individual, birthDate, entryDate, status, details) SELECT #{speciesID},#{tankID},#{branchID},#{classificationCode}, IFNULL((SELECT MAX(CodeNumber) FROM animalManagement WHERE classificationCode = #{classificationCode}), 0) + 1, #{nickname},#{individual},#{birthDate},#{entryDate},#{status},#{details}
INSERT INTO file(category, idx, path, serverFileName, oriFileName) values(#{category},#{idx},#{path},#{serverFileName},#{oriFileName})
